blog.name: silhouette-cosplay
blog.title: Silhouette Cosplay
blog.description:
Heya! I'm a detail costumer and cosplayer from Boston; Loki shapeshifter/illusionist, and 500% dork. 
Loki costumes are my specialty, but I've done lots of others including Black Widow, Mary Morstan, and "Rapunzel Rider"! 
Next project: Raven (RWBY)
Next con: ConnectiCon 2018

summary:
DAENERYS TARGARYEN LANDING/DRAGONSTONE COSTUME 

I took some glamour/studio shots of Daenerys to really show off the entire...
caption:
DAENERYS TARGARYEN LANDING/DRAGONSTONE COSTUME

I took some glamour/studio shots of Daenerys to really show off the entire costume and especially the embroidery. I’m still a little awed that I made this! It was such a huge learning curve for someone who’d never done much embroidery before, and certainly nothing on this level. The whole costume was about 250 hours of work over the course of four months!

Silhouette Cosplay
Facebook | Instagram | Twitter | Ko-fi

blog.name: faramir-boromir
blog.title: rebellions are built on hope
blog.description: I do not love the bright sword for its sharpness, nor the arrow for its swiftness, nor the warrior for his glory. I love only that which they defend.

summary: I think it’s funny how ~some people~ desperately want Arya to hate Dany but truth is Arya will consider Dany the sister she...
question: I think it’s funny how ~some people~ desperately want Arya to hate Dany but truth is Arya will consider Dany the sister she always wanted to have, and those people won’t have the right to complain about it because S*nsa wanted the same with Margaery. Also Arya and Dany are GRRM’s second faves after Tyrion, and his favorite female characters.
answer:
Arya and Dany will be friends. Dany is typical hero who Arya always adored. Dragons and Targaryens were always her idols.

Especially Arya and Dany has a lot of parallel storyline.

Drogon<_>Nymerya

Escape from Kings Landing to Braavos

Magics and Family tragedies.

I know that Jon is absolutely sure that Dany and Arya will like each other.

“Arya hates Dany” is delusion of Sansa fans who really hates Arya.

Dany is type who always wanted Arya to be her sister. Dany is person who will be Aryas dream sister.

Sansa will be jealous while Dany will be bery important for Arya. Such an important as Sansa never been .

Sansa’s fans tries to interpretations that Dany will be hateful person for Arya but it’s not reality. Sansa’s fans really hate Dany and Sansa while they are the most important persons in Jon’s life

Dany and Arya ❤️❤️❤️

Thanks for asking.

summary: "[Martin] just sort of mentioned in passing, 'Oh well it's all about Dany and Jon Snow,'" Taylor said. "And at the time I...
body:
Allan Taylor

“[Martin] just sort of mentioned in passing, ’Oh well it’s all about Dany and Jon Snow,’” Taylor said. “And at the time I thought, ‘Really? I thought it was about Sean Bean and Robb Stark?’”

“But [Martin] knew from the very beginning where he was driving and now we’re starting to see that come to fruition,” Taylor said. “We know that it’s circling tighter and tighter on Dany and Jon and their partnership is starting to form, you know, ’fire and ice.’”

“I can’t say much more about what [Martin] said about where we’re going with Dany and Jon because that leaps ahead into the next season,” Taylor said. “But to me the revelation was that, at the time, we had a hundred characters and yet he knew it’s about these two.”

“In my episode we get to take a big step forward in that Jon is no longer competing with her - he was willing to bow down and recognize her as queen,” Taylor said. “That’s a huge step. And also they’re holding hands, and the look that she gives him in that scene where she almost swoons and draws back … it’s pretty clear where this is headed, but it’s not there yet.”

Jeremy Podeswa

“With Jon and Dany’s scene, the important thing for me was that it wouldn’t be prurient in any way, that there’s a very strong undercurrent in that scene,” said Podeswa. “It was shot very, very simply. It’s basically just one steady push in shot to Jon and Dany and then that very important look between them at mid-level. And then a one-shot looking at Jon, then looking down at Dany. It wasn’t about shooting a big lovemaking scene. Once they’re making love, that’s the story. There’s no reason to kind of linger on that.”

“But the real story within the story, was actually what was going on with their eyes and what’s happening — there’s an understanding between them that even though they know in some part of them that they shouldn’t really be doing this, they cannot not do it,” he added. “There’s some element of destiny that’s brought them together, and they can’t fight it.”

“Jon and Dany together in this sweep of destiny, in this sweep of history. It was very much written that way. My contribution to that was really making that cinematic and making this feel like a fluid movement through time as we’re seeing this all unfold.”

“It’s an epic revelation about the past, and an epic revelation that’s suggestive of the future and what’s going to happen,” director Jeremy Podeswa

“We built in a moment between Kit and Emilia where they stopped for a moment and looked into each other’s eyes. The intention from my point of view, and their point of view too, is that they’re driven by passion into this. They don’t even fully understand what it’s all about and what the consequences of it are. They really can’t stop themselves. It’s almost destiny that’s bringing them together,” Podeswa added.

“an almost dreamy uniting of Jon and Dany because there’s this cosmic force that’s bringing them together.”_Jeremy Podeswa

summary: Scene where Jon clashed with Ramsy wasn’t in original scenar. Kit Harington added this scene with his interpretation. When Jonsa...
body: Scene where Jon clashed with Ramsy wasn’t in original scenar. Kit Harington added this scene with his interpretation. When Jonsa are talking that it was Jon Snow’s (Love) feelings interpretation is absolutely lie.
